---

**Priority Assessment:**
- **P0 (Critical):** App crashes, data loss, security issue
- **P1 (High):** Major feature broken, impacts many users
- **P2 (Medium):** Minor feature issue, has workaround
- **P3 (Low):** Cosmetic issue, rare edge case
